title: If we used modern materials to make a suit of armour for a 15th Century Knight to use, what would it be made from, what would it look like and would it be significantly better for him? - Quora

response.answer_text: Titanium plates and Kevlar as an external hard shell and kapok for the soft lining : it is used for modern body armour and explosive ordinance disposal as it is bullet proof; stab proof and slash proof and pressure resistant. It would look not dissimilar to an advanced bomb suit and would be considerably lighter than a medieval suit of armour as advanced bomb suits weigh no more 37 kilogrammes.
